scripts.start: spago install && spago build && webpack serve --mode=development --open
scripts.start:8086: spago install && spago build && webpack serve --mode=development --port=8086 --open
scripts.start:ngrok: spago install && spago build && webpack serve --mode=development --public=https://db50f37087a4.ngrok.io --open
scripts.start:storybook: python makeStorybook.py && spago -x storybook.dhall install && spago -x storybook.dhall build && cross-env WEBPACK_ENTRY=./src/storybook.js WAGSI_MODE=example webpack serve --port 8081 --mode=development --open
scripts.start:example: spago install && spago build && cross-env WAGSI_MODE=example webpack serve --port 8081 --mode=development --open
scripts.start:djqc: spago install && spago build && cross-env WAGSI_MODE=djqc webpack serve --mode=development
scripts.build:storybook: python makeStorybook.py && spago -x storybook.dhall install && spago -x storybook.dhall build && cross-env WEBPACK_ENTRY=./src/storybook.js WAGSI_MODE=example webpack
